statements: UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET rating = 4.5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;

UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET product_id = 101, rating = 4.2, created_at = '2022-06-15 09:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 25
UPDATE feedback_table SET feedback_text = 'Good service' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE review_table SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Great product' WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE feedback_table SET customer_name='John Doe', feedback_text='Great product' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE review_table SET rating=5, review_text='Excellent product' WHERE product_id=100;
UPDATE CustomerFeedback SET rating = 4 WHERE feedback_id = 1;

UPDATE ProductDescription SET description = 'New features added, improved performance' WHERE product_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4.5, review = 'Great product, highly recommend' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4.5, review = 'Great product, highly recommended' WHERE customer_id = 123 AND product_id = 456;
UPDATE product_description SET description = 'New and improved version with enhanced features' WHERE product_id = 789;
